attributes.action: Change the law about comission charged  by Uber/Bolt.
attributes.additional_details: Uber charges more than 50% commission from drivers. Drivers come with their own cars, pay for insurance, fuel, car maintenance. Car depreciation is massive after 2-3 years. Drivers need to work more than 12 hours a day as  to cover the necessary expenses. Uber destroyed the cab and minicab industry with dump prices, eliminated the competition and now they have increased the prices a lot for customers and charge huge commissions from drivers..
attributes.background: The govermment must cap the comission charged at maximum 20% by such companies like Uber and Bolt

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the commission platforms charge users are a matter for individual platforms, not the UK Government or Parliament.
